law.catch_line: Civil offenses and penalties; hearing officers.

text.section:
Sec. 8CC-1. Civil offenses and penalties; hearing officers.
The violation of any County ordinance listed in of this chapter shall constitute a civil offense punishable by civil penalty in the amount prescribed in and as modified by of this chapter. Accordingly, there is hereby created and established a code enforcement position to be filled by hearing officers to enforce the ordinances listed in which are contained in and enacted pursuant to this Code.
